item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 14, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Kerning, the Hard Way (97 points | 28 comments)
2. Decrypting encrypted files from Akira ransomware using a bunch of GPUs (111 points | 18 comments)
3. Athena landed in a dark crater where the temperature was minus 280° F (66 points | 120 comments)
4. Samsung Q990D unresponsive after 1020 firmware update (516 points | 432 comments)
5. I'm Peter Roberts, immigration attorney who does work for YC and startups. AMA (175 points | 261 comments)
6. Briar: Peer to Peer Encrypted Messaging (153 points | 54 comments)
7. Ask HN: Any insider takes on Yann LeCun's push against current architectures? (134 points | 132 comments)
8. Exo: Exocompilation for productive programming of hardware accelerators (42 points | 12 comments)
9. A look at Firefox forks (184 points | 121 comments)
10. GCVR (YC W22) is hiring a lead technical artist ( | hide)
11. Block Diffusion: Interpolating between autoregressive and diffusion models (98 points | 24 comments)
12. I-cant-believe-its-not-webusb: Hacking around lack of WebUSB support in Firefox (281 points | 246 comments)
13. FBI, EPA, and Treasury told Citibank to freeze funds to claw back climate money (106 points | 45 comments)
14. Magpies and crows are using “anti-bird spikes” to make nests (2023) (199 points | 76 comments)
15. A 2FA app that tells you when you get `314159` (2024) (181 points | 83 comments)
16. Owl: Optimized Workforce Learning for multi-agent collaboration (21 points | 1 comment)
17. Why do transit agencies keep falling for the hydrogen bus myth? (86 points | 142 comments)
18. In S3 simplicity is table stakes (156 points | 100 comments)
19. Show HN: OCR Benchmark Focusing on Automation (28 points | 13 comments)
20. My Scammer Girlfriend: Baiting a Romance Fraudster (385 points | 143 comments)
21. Apple will soon support encrypted RCS messaging with Android users (69 points | 35 comments)
22. It doesn't cost much to improve someone's life (29 points | 12 comments)
23. Everything you say to your Echo will be sent to Amazon starting on March 28 (68 points | 27 comments)
24. AMD's Strix Halo under the hood (146 points | 112 comments)
25. Making Postgres scale (110 points | 109 comments)
26. The Internet of Beefs (2020) (19 points | 3 comments)
27. Show HN: CodeVideo – Two years in the making to build an event-sourced IDE (55 points | 19 comments)
28. The Cassowary Linear Arithmetic Constraint Solving Algorithm [pdf] (2002) (45 points | 19 comments)
29. Ask HN: How much traffic do you serve and with which database engine? (41 points | 11 comments)
30. Stoicism's appeal to the rich and powerful (2019) (166 points | 257 comments)
